title: Ticket #5344: condor_submit -i lacks default request_memory
description:
condor_submit -interactive submits a job, whose template submit file lacks a request_memory. This leads to jobs matching to machines with too little memory, and when strict memory limits are enforced, the interactive job can go on hold suddenly.

Picking a good default seems difficult, but we will arbitrarily make the default 512 megabytes. If the end user needs to override this, they can in a custom submit file, but the default should be big enough to at least allow for moderate interactive usage.
